title: Glögg
description: The Norwegian version of mulled wine is so perfect at Christmas. The raisins and nuts make their own little snack in the bottom of each glass.
steps: Combine all ingredients (except the raisins and hazelnuts) in a pan and warm up very slowly, never allowing it to boil.
Place two tablespoons each of raisins and hazelnuts into each glass and ladle in the glögg.
